knowledge: Peach (color) . Peach is a color that is named for the pale color of the exterior flesh of the peach fruit. Like the color apricot, the color called "peach" is paler than most actual peach fruits and seems to have been formulated (like the color apricot) primarily to create a pastel palette of colors for interior design. Peach can also be described as a pale, orangish-yellow.
